items.text: tossed up, just outside off, and drilled to deep extra cover
items.postText: Shihab: "Has any lbw appeal been turned down this inning?" -- ha ha

items.preText: Things getting cloudy. The sky as well as Bangladesh's innings
items.text: length ball, wide enough to cut square to point

items.shortText: Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, no run
Roach to Mosaddek Hossain, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on off, and drilled to long off for a walking single
length ball, just outside off, tapped away to point
items.shortText: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, and guided to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: fullish, outside off again. Guided to point, but can't find the gap
items.shortText: Allen to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and angling in. Flicked off his pads to square leg
stopped at wide long off! Full, outside off, and confidently lofted over extra cover
items.postText: Rashid : "@Shihab, well said, but all were given by Richard Kettleborough who is well reputed umpire. First one was down leg and other two were well judged."

items.text: nearly a yorker, just outside off. Dug away to third man

items.shortText: Holder to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: over square leg! Length ball, outside off stump, and he drags a pull from outside off stump. Flies over the fielder in the deep
items.shortText: Holder to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

items.text: full toss, on his hips, and clipped to deep midwicket
full, on off, and worked off his pads to square leg
items.postText: khan: "BD equalled WI 152/1 of 24 overs within 17 overs. And they are behind the game, this is called luck."

items.text: another full toss on off, and punched to mid-off. He keeps strike
length ball, angling in, and flicked off his hips to square leg
full, on off, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge to point instead
items.postText: Aadil: "Considering their form this tournament, Bangladesh deserves to win the trophy, go Bangladesh go"

items.text: length ball angling in, and muscled off the back foot to wide long on
full outside off, and he tries to slog towards the leg side. Sliced, but safely near extra cover
full, on off, and pushed into the off side. Chase the man riding the boundary
items.postText: Richie: "A man who took a wicket to give himself a bowling average of 168 could be the key to Windies winning this. Crazy!! "
